name: Duck Optimizer Pro 2021
description:
Help fix the [totally real] duck so that it will rejoin the other ducklings and live a very ducky life devoid of malicious intentions!

That's correct, in this Dream Buster game u get to play as a duck mechanic.
Solve puzzles and fix the necessary parts.

Credits:

James9270 - Coding
Noogai223 - Sprites
lau - Music + Trailer
Rjwest07 - Team Mascot
Red - Modeling, Technical Art
